alert.note: Alert for Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 2:46PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jefferson Davis and southeastern Calcasieu Parishes through 315 PM CDT... At 245 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Charles Regional Airport, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Jennings, Welsh, Iowa, Fenton, Lake Charles Regional Airport, Lebleu Settlement, Pine Island, Holmwood, Bell City, Roanoke, Lacassine and Hathaway. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana near mile marker 32, and between mile markers 34 and 65. Interstate 210 between mile markers 4 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
